name: Oleg Koshevy
about1: I am a dedicated Front-End developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with expertise in React. Having successfully completed full-stack development courses. I have expanded my skill set to include GIT, SASS, React Toolkit, Redux, Webpack, RestAPI & Node.js. My determination and enthusiasm for learning are evident in my ability to thrive in challenging and dynamic environments.
about2: I bring valuable team experience, having served both as a developer and a team leader. I am well-versed in various methodologies, fostering a collaborative and efficient work environment. My creative problem-solving skills and motivation drive me to make a positive impact on everyday life and business. I am a fast learner, adaptable to new technologies, and confident in delivering high-quality results even under high-pressure situations and tight deadlines. The modern possibilities of technology inspire me, and I am eager to contribute to a large working business mechanism.
about3: My projects include the development of interactive and user-friendly interfaces that ensure an excellent user experience. While working on projects, I pay attention to details and strive to create high-quality code. My goal is not only to build efficient and aesthetically pleasing web applications but also to continuously grow in the field of Front-End development, keeping up with the latest trends and advanced methods. I am ready for new challenges and opportunities that will allow me to continue my growth and contribute to the development of innovative technologies.
about4: If you liked what you saw on my website and have suggestions, I'm ready to discuss them with you. Since I believe in the power of collaboration and am convinced that the best results are achieved when we combine our efforts and ideas, together we can create something truly impressive and meaningful. If you have any questions or are ready to start collaborating, feel free to contact me. I look forward to the opportunity to work with you!

education.description: GoIT School is an educational institution specializing in teaching information technology. The school offers a wide range of courses covering various aspects of programming, web development, design, and other technological skills. Students at GoIT School acquire the essential knowledge and skills for a successful start in the IT field, whether it's a career as a developer, designer, or any other technology-related specialist.

education.degree: Master's degree in Navigation (Deep Sea Captain)
education.description: Odessa National Maritime University (ONMU) is an educational institution dedicated to maritime studies. The university provides a diverse array of courses, focusing on maritime sciences, navigation, marine engineering, and related fields. With a rich history and commitment to excellence, ONMU prepares students for careers in the maritime industry, offering comprehensive education and practical training.

education.university: Odessa Maritime College of Technical Fleet (OMCTF)
education.description: Odessa Maritime College of Technical Fleet (OMCTF) is an educational institution specializing in technical maritime training. The college offers a wide range of courses covering technical aspects of maritime studies, navigation, marine engineering, and related disciplines. With a focus on providing practical skills and knowledge, OMCTF prepares students for careers in the technical fleet, ensuring a solid foundation for success in the maritime industry.
